PROPFIND.caption: PropFind
PROPFIND.description: WebDAV: Retrieves properties defined on the resource identified by the request URI.

PROPPATCH.caption: PropPatch
PROPPATCH.description: WebDAV: Processes instructions specified in the request body to set and/or remove properties defined on the resource.

MKCOL.caption: MkCol
MKCOL.description: WebDAV: Creates a new collection (directory) at the location specified by the Request-URI.

COPY.caption: Copy
COPY.description: WebDAV: Creates a duplicate of the source resource at the destination.

MOVE.caption: Move
MOVE.description: WebDAV: Moves a resource from the request URI to the destination URI.

LOCK.caption: Lock
LOCK.description: WebDAV: Used to take out a lock of any access type on the resource.

UNLOCK.caption: Unlock
UNLOCK.description: WebDAV: Removes the lock identified by the lock token from the request URI.

ORDERPATCH.caption: OrderPatch
ORDERPATCH.description: WebDAV: Used to change the ordering of the members of a collection.

ACL.caption: ACL
ACL.description: WebDAV: Used to modify the Access Control List (permissions) of a resource.

REPORT.caption: Report
REPORT.description: WebDAV/Versioning: Used to obtain information about a resource, such as version history.

VERSION-CONTROL.caption: Version Control
VERSION-CONTROL.description: WebDAV/Versioning: Used to put a resource under version control.

CHECKIN.caption: Checkin
CHECKIN.description: WebDAV/Versioning: Used to check in a resource, creating a new version.

CHECKOUT.caption: Checkout
CHECKOUT.description: WebDAV/Versioning: Used to check out a resource to create a modify-able working copy.

UNCHECKOUT.caption: Uncheckout
UNCHECKOUT.description: WebDAV/Versioning: Used to cancel a checkout and restore the resource to its previous state.

MKWORKSPACE.caption: MkWorkspace
MKWORKSPACE.description: WebDAV/Versioning: Creates a new workspace for version-controlled resources.

UPDATE.caption: Update
UPDATE.description: WebDAV/Versioning: Updates a resource to a specific version state.

LABEL.caption: Label
LABEL.description: WebDAV/Versioning: Used to label or tag a specific version of a resource.

MERGE.caption: Merge
MERGE.description: WebDAV/Versioning: Used to merge changes from one branch or resource into another.

BASELINE-CONTROL.caption: Baseline Control
BASELINE-CONTROL.description: WebDAV/Versioning: Used to place a collection under baseline control.

MKACTIVITY.caption: MkActivity
MKACTIVITY.description: WebDAV/Versioning: Creates an activity to track a set of changes.

PRI.caption: Pri
PRI.description: HTTP/2: The PRI method is used strictly in the HTTP/2 connection preface.

BIND.caption: Bind
BIND.description: WebDAV: Creates a new binding (alias) to an existing resource.

UNBIND.caption: Unbind
UNBIND.description: WebDAV: Removes a binding to a resource.

REBIND.caption: Rebind
REBIND.description: WebDAV: Atomically moves a binding to a new location.

MKREDIRECTREF.caption: MkRedirectRef
MKREDIRECTREF.description: WebDAV: Creates a reference that redirects to another resource.

UPDATEREDIRECTREF.caption: UpdateRedirectRef
UPDATEREDIRECTREF.description: WebDAV: Updates an existing redirect reference.

MKCALENDAR.caption: MkCalendar
MKCALENDAR.description: CalDAV: Creates a new calendar collection.

LINK.caption: Link
LINK.description: Extension: Used to establish relationships between resources (Deprecated).

UNLINK.caption: Unlink
UNLINK.description: Extension: Used to remove relationships between resources (Deprecated).

TRACK.caption: Track
TRACK.description: Legacy/Debug: Performs a message loop-back test. Often used by vulnerability scanners to test for XST.
